title: Naturopathic Medicine, Portland, OR | Root Whole Body
description: Root Whole Body's Naturopathic physicians in Porltand are top-voted and trained to be expert listeners to improve your oberall wellness goals and health.
cleaned_text: Naturopathic Medicine . Naturopathic primary care physicians focused on prevention and whole body wellness. [Book Appointment](https://clients.mindbodyonline.com/classic/ws?studioid=1168&stype=-9&sTG=7&sView=day&sLoc=0) New Patient Appointment A complete new patient intake including full history, physical exam and complete assessment to develop a personalized whole body health plan, address acute and chronic issues and provide support and guidance on your path to complete wellness. [Book Appointment](https://clients.mindbodyonline.com/classic/ws?studioid=1168&stype=-9&sTG=7&sView=day&sLoc=0) Follow Up Appointments Time with your doctor to measure progress, address new or changing symptoms, complete lab work or asses lab results, or consider a new course of treatment. [Book Appointment](https://clients.mindbodyonline.com/classic/ws?studioid=1168&stype=-101&sTG=21&sView=day&sLoc=2) BioTe This method of Pellet Therapy for hormone balance, is a bio-identical therapy that works to correct symptoms of hormonal imbalance caused by aging. When hormones are out of balance, it can cause a broad range of symptoms such as weight gain, low libido & brain fog. The pellets are tiny and custom-compounded and are inserted in a simple in-office procedure. They gradually absorb, dispersing bioidentical hormones, resulting in improved mood, sleep & mental clarity, increased energy, muscle mass & weight loss and restored libido. To start, see if you are a candidate for Biote by getting a hormone evaluation. [Book Appointment](mailto:clinic@rootwholebody.com?subject=BioTe) IV Nutrient Therapy [Book Appointment](https://clients.mindbodyonline.com/classic/ws?studioid=1168&stype=-9&sTG=7&sView=day&sLoc=0) Physical Manipulations Performed by a trained Naturopathic Physician, this form of physical medicine gently manipulates muscles, bones and spine to relieve pain and regain functionality. Similar to chiropractic adjustments, naturopathic manipulations are performed by first evaluating the musculoskeletal system then using gentle adjustment techniques, massage and stretching to manipulate spinal segments and joints. Physical Manipulations can be used to treat a variety of conditions including cervical strains, low back pain, pelvic & hip pain, TMJ dysfunction and headaches. [Book Appointment](https://clients.mindbodyonline.com/classic/ws?studioid=1168&stype=-9&sTG=7&sView=day&sLoc=0) Vitamin Injections Platelet Rich Plasma Hair Restoration [Book Appointment](https://clients.mindbodyonline.com/classic/ws?studioid=1168&stype=-9&sTG=7&sView=day&sLoc=0) Complimentary Consultation Curious about functional, natural medicine? Experience a 15-minute introductory consultation with a Naturopathic Physician. Walk in with questions, walk out with a plan.
